page.title: 09Home Life
page.content:
A day in the life of Paul Wadsworh.
I get up at about 7.30.a.m. on a saturday,and after a cup of coffee I wash and dress.We have breakfast and then I help with a few jobs.Usually on saturday mornings we go swiming at Chepstow Leisure Centre until lunch time.After lunch I have a tennis lesson at Whitecross School,Lydney from 2.00-3.30.p.m.
In fine weather I spend the rest of the day playing with my friends in the garden,or on the green.At 6.30.p.m.I have my supper,watch T.V for an hour or so,clean my teeth and bath and go to bed.
